select.id: select振込エラーリスト情報

mapper.select: SELECT 振込明細.* FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 振込明細 WHERE "kozaDataFlag" = FALSE ORDER BY 振込明細."hihokenshaNo", 振込明細."serviceTeikyoYM", 振込明細."dataKubun", 振込明細."seiriNo", 振込明細."rirekiNo"

select.id: select処理結果確認リスト情報

mapper.select: SELECT 処理結果確認.* FROM "DbWT0512ShoriKekkaKakuninList" AS 処理結果確認 ORDER BY "errorKubun", "shoKisaiHokenshaNo", "hiHokenshaNo", "key1", "key2", "key3", "key4", "key5"
